title: Obama sat down with Nilay Patel on Decoder to talk about AI, free speech, and more.
description: Former President Barack Obama sat down with Decoder to talk about AI, free speech, and the future of the internet. Check out the full interview tomorrow on YouTube and wherever you get your podcasts. transcript: . Hello! Hello, sir. Nilay, how are you? Nice to meet you. Very nice to meet you. Thank you for doing this with us. Looks like you've cleaned out my whole office for this. Yeah. We got rid of it. How you been? Doing all right, man. How are you? I'm doing great. I should have to told you, by the way. You didn't have to wear a tie, but you look sharp. You know more about this stuff than I do. Uh. Well, that's terrifying.
